content: baby baubles baby blanket finished size approximately 36 x 42 materials list 40 oz caron simply soft country blue size i crochet hook body row 1 chain 123 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across chain 3 turn 122 single_crochet row 2 skip first single_crochet *work yo insert hook in st yo pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook 3 times in next single_crochet yo draw through remaining 4 loops on hook chain 1 skip next single_crochet repeat from * to last 2 single_crochet double_crochet in last single_crochet chain 1 turn 60 bauble clusters row 3 single_crochet in top of each cluster and each chain 1 space end with single_crochet in double_crochet from previous row chain 3 turn 122 single_crochet row 4-83 repeat row 2 and 3 alternately border round 1 working in sides free loops of foundation chain and across top of last row single_crochet evenly around working 3 single_crochet in corners round 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in each single_crochet around working 3 double_crochet in corners round 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each double_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in corners finish off weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
